body.name: ATUMTEK Metal Phone Tripod Mount, Universal Aluminum Smartphone Mount Adapter with 3 Cold Shoe, 3 1/4” Screw Mount, Arca Port and 1 Convertible Cold Shoe Adapter, 360° Rotation & 145° Tilt Angle
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 18 hrs 38 mins
features: [Solid All-metal Construction] Our phone tripod attachment boasts an entire body crafted from high-quality aircraft-grade aluminum, delivering not only robust stability but also a sleek, versatile design.

[Triple Cold Shoe Mounts & Dual Screw Holes] This smartphone holder features two rotatable cold shoe mounts at both ends of the phone clamp, one cold shoe mount along with two 1/4" screw holes on the back (for Articulating Magic Arms extension). These provide you with the freedom to attach additional accessories like video lights and microphones, enhancing your videos, streams, vlogs, and photography. It's an essential tool for YouTubers, Vloggers, and outdoor photographers.

[Arca Mount Compatible] Our phone tripod mount offers versatile installation options. Method 1: Its Arca quick-release design allows for a direct connection to a 38mm ball head. Method 2: The phone mount adapter features its convertible cold shoe adapter at the bottom of Arca Port, which can be securely fixed to a camera. Method 3: A 1/4" screw hole at the bottom enables easy attachment to tripods.

[Flexible Angles] Enjoy seamless flexibility with 360° rotation (8 adjustable angles, 45° each) and 145° tilt angles. The 360° rotation enables effortless switching between portrait and landscape modes, while the 145° tilt angle allows you to adjust the pitch angle on a tripod or camera hot shoe without needing a ball head. The rotary knob ensures a secure grip for both landscape and portrait shooting.

[Universal Phone Compatibility] The clamp accommodates phones ranging from 5.8cm/2.28'' to 9.4cm/3.7'' in width. This phone tripod mount is compatible with a wide range of models, including iPhone 14/14 Pro/14 Pro Max/13/13 Pro/13 Pro Max/12/12 Pro/12 Pro Max/11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/X/XS/XR/XS Max/8/7, Samsung Galaxy S23/S23 Plus/S23 Ultra, Huawei, Google Pixel and more. Please note that: tripods, microphones, LED lights, and other accessories are not included.

[Ergonomic Design] The user-friendly design incorporates notches at both ends of the cold shoe mounts, making it easy to grip and rotate them by hand. Additionally, the movable end of the spring clamp features a groove, allowing for effortless finger grip during installation.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ATUMTEK versatile hardware phone clamp, crafted from premium aluminum alloy for exceptional durability and stability. Elevate your content creation with the ATUMTEK Multi-functional Phone Clamp Stand.
Crafted to provide stability, versatility, and ergonomic usability for your live streaming and recording needs. Get yours now and enhance your creative journey !
For Photogrphy For Vlogging For Filming For Streaming For Interviewing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Smartphone holder
reviews.reviewText: After reading the review for this and other compatible products, I went with this one. It is a very sturdy holder and it holds my iPhone XR (that is in a protective case) securely and it fits on my tripod (that I purchased back in the when we used 35mm film! I highly recommend this holder, just make sure the dimensions will support holding your smartphone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite all aluminum phone mount thus far, and it has detents!
reviews.reviewText: Rock solid construction and great for my astronomy tripod setups. NO slop, NO super flexy, non-confidence inspiring hold, and I love the detents in the pivots! Makes it much easier in the dark to know if you've made much adjustment without turning lights on, which is a great way to mess with your night adapted eyes. The cold shoe mount and adapters really offer lots of versatility for mounting options. One thing to note is this mount is quite heavy for being constructed of full aluminum and took a bit of getting used to, making sure all my mounts and extension were up to task to keep things stable. The plastic stuff still can be handy in a pinch or as a spare in my kit bag, but the Atumtek has offered the best in mount security and robustness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile and High quality Phone Clamp.
reviews.reviewText: As the quality and capabilities of mobile phone photography and videography have, in my opinion, now made possible professional caliber results, it becomes that much more important that the accessories used in production, enable the quality of images of which some phones are capable. You don’t put a $15 needle on a $500 turntable.The Atumtek Phone Mount is just such a quality accessory; it is solidly built, versatile and can be used to mount a phone on a tripod, gimbal, camera hotshoe, or on an extension pole or table top tripod for hand held panning, blogging, etc.All contact surfaces are rubberized to protect the phone and there are coldshoe mounts on each end of the clamp itself that can be used to hold further accessories, for example a microphone or lighting. The clamp itself has plenty of depth and easily holds an iPhone 15 Pro Max while it is enclosed in a case.The side knob is used for tilting forward and backward and has definite detents that can be felt when tilting the clamp; I found that in order to tighten the tilt axis securely it is important to position it at a detent. The rear knob is loosened from its locked position so the clamped phone can be rotated in a 360-degree circle and there are eight definite detents within. Once locked down at a detent, both knobs hold the clamp securely and without play.The Atumtek has a variety of mounting options. The knurled knob at the bottom is used to lower and retract a hot/coldshoe mounting plate. When in its retracted position, the phone mount fits an Arca quick release clamp, or there is a standard ¼” hole at the very bottom, typically used to mount a tripod. As well there are ¼” holes on the back of the Atumtek that can be used to hold an external battery or SSD memory.It’s nice to finally see a pro quality phone mounting option enter the marketplace, rather than all the plastic variations that seem to treat mobile phone image making as an afterthought. Stunning work is now being produced using mobile phones and the Atumtek Phone Tripod Mount is a perfect accessory to that end.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm thrilled with this product. I carry it with me most of the time. It fits my iPhone 13 Pro Max perfectly. The adjustments are smooth and plenty. The material used is of excellent quality. And the built quality of this tripod mount is excellent! It's sturdy and very versatile to use.
Received the mount in less than 24hours and is very well built. It also fits an iPhone 15 MAX well and keeps it sturdy.
Support solide avec plusieurs possibilité de réglages.

reviews.reviewTitle: Soporte de excelente calidad y muy versatil
reviews.reviewText: Soporte para movil realmente solido y con gran versatilidad.Admite la colocacion en tripode, o sobre la camara, asi como la posibilidad de ubicar algun accesorio con zapata en los extremos.Gran diseño gran soporte

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The ATUMTEK Metal Phone Tripod Mount is a very versatile Smartphone tripod mount system indeed, it covers the 1/4 screw fittings the Arca fitting and also the hot shoe fitting on a DSLR camera. Sturdy and well made and to date I have had absolutely no problems with it. This is a great piece of kit for anyone that is an enthusiastic smartphone photographer. As perfect as it gets.
